send-invite-message: Send an invitation to a friend to tap your eggs together!
invalid_link: This link is not valid anymore
teaser_draw: Both the eggs were cracked but it was fun!
teaser_winner: There was an unbeatable winner in the egg tapping battle! Who that is? Find out for yourself !
invitation_text: $1 invited you to tap easter eggs! Click on the link to respond.
title: Tap easter egg
name: Name
waiting-egg-fellow: Waiting connection, keep this window open.
resend-invitation-note: You can resend the invitation pressing the following button. You can send the invitation only to one person
winning-egg: Your egg $1 won! Keep winning always!
losing-egg:
Oh no, your egg was owned $1 !
No worries, health comes first!
draw-egg:
Your egg $1 broke, but mine as well!
Best of health, till next year!
meta_title: Tap Easter Eggs with your loved ones in distance!
meta_ogdescription: Tap Easter Egg is a web app for all of us that do not have the chance to spend these days with our loved ones !
description_results: Find out which egg broke and which won the egg tapping!
